attributes.action: Keep open the Castle Armoury military installation in bury.
attributes.additional_details: Cadets go to this installation, Reservists go to this installation, a military presence in the building immediately makes it the peoples building, for the people.
attributes.background: The Castle Armoury is an army reserve centre and cadet detachment/squadron and it is being closed, the cadets are upset, the reservists are upset and the entire town is upset. We want the government/parliament to keep the Castle Armoury open.

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about the local drill halls are an operational matter for those responsible for individual detachments, not the UK Government or Parliament.
